title: Former Judge Paul Carney dies
content:
Thursday 24 September 2015   
 

       

Tributes are being paid to well known Dublin born judge Paul Carney who has died at the age of 72. 

The outspoken Judge retired from the Central Criminal Court in April.

Over the course of his career he presided over more than a 100 murder and rape trials, some of them Ireland's most high profile and notorious cases.
